field.p: Use leads if you need a qualification step before creating an opportunity or a customer. It can be a business card you received, a contact form filled in your website, or a file of unqualified prospects you import, etc.
Once qualified, the lead can be converted into a business opportunity and/or a new customer in your address book.

field.p: Odoo helps you keep track of your sales pipeline to follow up potential sales and better forecast your future revenues.
